title: Biden Admin Suspends Vaccine Mandate — But The Fight Is Just Beginning
description:
Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing provides an update on the Daily Wire’s legal battle with the Biden administration over OSHA’s unconstitutional and tyrannical vaccine mandate. While the Biden administration has temporarily suspended the mandate amid the pending legal battle — this fight is just beginning. 
We are fighting for the medical freedom of all American citizens. Help us reach our signatures goal and tell Biden, "NO vaccine mandates." Sign the petition here: https://utm.io/udWOW
Subscribe to ENOUGH on Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/enough/id1536700147
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

content:encoded:
Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing provides an update on the Daily Wire’s legal battle with the Biden administration over OSHA’s unconstitutional and tyrannical vaccine mandate. While the Biden administration has temporarily suspended the mandate amid the pending legal battle — this fight is just beginning.

We are fighting for the medical freedom of all American citizens. Help us reach our signatures goal and tell Biden, "NO vaccine mandates." Sign the petition here: https://utm.io/udWOW
